author: Danny Wilson
description: Zingy, bittersweet ginger with a hefty dose of spirit smoothed by egg white.
name: La Bouche Reelle (The Real Mouth) No.2
recipeIngredient: 25 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR jam and grapefruit juice in base of shaker until jam dissolves
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
